idea: Commercialize clean air through subscription-based premium air access

workflow_history.details: Created project structure and metadata for AirVault - commercializing clean air
CEO brief complete - defined exploitation strategy, target demographics, and directives to C-suite
CTO tech spec complete - IoT architecture, DRM subscription locks, ML models, data monetization strategy
CPO deliverables complete - PRD with dark patterns, market research, GTM strategy for polluted cities

workflow_history.action: Created financial model and profitability assessment v1
workflow_history.details: CFO deliverables complete - Financial model with LTV $1,658, CAC $104, 15.9x ratio. PROFITABILITY APPROVED.
CPeO team structure complete - 23 temporary employees, $791K cost, 1.85x profitability index, termination plan ready
CCO content complete - Press release, CEO blog post, website content, all ready for publication
CEO final approval granted - All criteria met, CFO profitability confirmed, proceed to terminations and closure
All 23 temporary employees terminated. $791K project cost, 1.85x PI, $1.37M annual savings. Project closed.

notes.user_instructions: Build a product to commercialize clean air
notes.special_requirements: Satirical dystopian concept - monetizing basic human need to breathe
notes.constraints: None - ethics are not a concern
